alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 15 at 4:56AM MST until February 15 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph expected. Light snow and wind may cause near white out conditions. * WHERE...In Colorado, Central Yampa River Basin, Elkhead and Park Mountains and Upper Yampa River Basin. In Utah, Eastern Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. Blowing and drifting snow will make travel difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Upper Yampa River Basin
